box1.heading: Hi I'm Nuriddinbek Obidjonov
box1.text: Software professional with 1.5+ year experience, a strong focus on customers, excellent communication abilities, and technical platform competence

box3.heading: Time Zone
box3.text: I'm based in Tashkent, Uzbekistan, and open to remote work worldwide

box4.heading: Do you want to start a project together ?

box5.heading: Tech Stack
box5.text: I specialize in variety of languages, frameworks and tools that allows me to build rebust and scalable applications

experiences.heading: My Work Experience
experiences.text: I've been working on Front-end Development for the past 2 years. Here's a timeline of my journey

exp1.1: - Created a personal portfolio using Three.js, React, Vite, and WebAPI to showcase technical expertise
exp1.2: - Continuously enhancing technical skills and expanding expertise in modern web development and back-end technologies

exp2.1: - Efficiently managing team, making sure tasks need be done on time on Trello
exp2.2: - Adding Telegram Bots and EmailJS to websites to provide real time communications with clients
exp2.3: - Using Three.js, antDesign, Swiper, Aos libraries to make sites flexible and smooth for better UX design
exp2.4: - Using i18next libraries effectively to create Multilingual sites
exp2.5: - Building responsive, secure and Rest-full API based websites with Tailwind, .env and React JS
exp2.6: - Enhanced application security and developed new features, adhering to standards set by the Passive Defense Organization and National Cyberspace Center
exp2.7: - Designed and implemented intuitive map interfaces using MapsUI, enhancing user experience and enabling seamless interactive map integration
exp2.8: - Enhanced responsiveness and usability of applications using Windows Forms and WPF frameworks
exp2.9: - Executed XML to SVG conversions using X-DOM, ensuring dynamic and efficient data visualization

exp3.1: - Creating sophisticated sites, small size websites and making it exclusively fast
exp3.2: - Making strong algorithm to loose repetition of code and making sites fast and light
exp3.3: - Raising performance and SEO to 90% – 100% and hoisting up sites to the top on Google search
exp3.4: - Engineered systems for large-scale data ingestion and analysis, ensuring efficient data processing and storage
exp3.5: ✅ Implemented secure APIs, following ISO 26262 automotive safety standards
exp3.6: ✅ Ensured data privacy for customers and partners through industry-compliant protocols
exp3.7: ✅ Delivered remote features like over-the-air updates, real-time tracking, and remote start capabilities
